attributes.action: make voting at all elections compulsory for ALL UK Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All uk citizens residing in this country should be made to attend a polling station and register their vote at local and general elections(Australia does it this way) We should not allow people to sit on the fence or make excuses for not casting their vote. I can understand that you the politician and your cohorts would not want this to happen, but we the public who do vote might see REAL democracy in the UK, if the law was changed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
